conversation.text: I'm in the mood for a gothic movie. Could you recommend a few?

conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text:
I'd highly recommend "Maleficent" (2014) for a gothic movie experience. This dark fantasy film stars Angelina Jolie as Maleficent, a vengeful fairy who curses an infant princess but eventually finds redemption. It's a visually stunning film with a compelling storyline that will keep you captivated!

If you're up for something more modern, "Hitch" (2005) is another excellent choice. This comedy-drama directed by Andy Tennant delves into the encounters between the legendary Alfred Hitchcock and François Truffaut, providing an intriguing look at the world of cinema history. Will Smith plays a charming character in this film that's both entertaining and educational!

Another intriguing option is "Alex in Wonderland", a film about a director navigating his personal life and artistic ambitions, starring Jeanne Moreau, Paul Mazursky, and Ellen Burstyn. Both movies offer deeper narratives that might appeal to you!
